# The Animal Physio Co. Scheduling Application

## Project Overview
Full-stack web application for mobile animal physiotherapy scheduling and client management.

## Tech Stack
- **Frontend**: React with TypeScript, drag-and-drop calendar UI
- **Backend**: Node.js with Express
- **Database**: MongoDB for client and schedule data
- **Key Features**: Location-based grouping, automatic scheduling, WhatsApp integration
